programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Ibrahim and Hafiq go head-to-head to see who can give a better badminton crash course. Damien tries ways and means to get the cash to pay for the sneaker raffle he won. Christine is bothered about Rose's closeness with Arasi but keeps her counsel about it.

programme.title: The Good Doctor S3
programme.desc: After Dr. Shaun Murphy treats a patient who is a social influencer, he deals with unwanted attention. Meanwhile, the team treats a woman who is in abdominal distress after an at-home faecal transplant; and Dr. Carly Lever's efforts to separate Shaun from Lea are challenged.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Ellen's Game Of Games S3
programme.desc: New season of the popular and fun gameshow. Volunteers from Ellen's studio audience play her outrageously fun games including Runaway Bride, Aw Snap and more for the chance to win a cash prize; special guests Jeff Foxworthy and Kenan Thompson join Ellen to play Stink Tank.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Donal's Super Food In Minutes
programme.desc: Donal Skehan is the thinking chef's chef. In this highly watchable series, he shows us how to create quick, easy, delicious meals inspired by global cuisine and bursting with flavour. Admired by renowned chefs like Nigella Lawson and Jamie Oliver for his creative, innovative approach to cooking, Donal focuses on everyday cooking, using ten ingredients or less and never spending more than thirty minutes on a meal. With an emphasis on ease, health and flavour he uses pared-back kitchen skills.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Cosmopolitan Cook
programme.desc: Passionate and creative cook Rachel Khoo goes in search of new ideas in this vibrant and fascinating series. Rachel travels to some of the most beautiful foodie countries in the world, heading for cosmopolitan locations both urban and rural to get inspiration for dinner parties with her friends back home. Rachel gets under the skin of the local cuisine, showing two very different culinary influences, such as Barcelona and rural Spain, or in Italy, Naples and the Amalfi coast.

programme.title: Earth From Space
programme.desc: Epic migration. Shifting seasons. The turning tide. Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale and are now so advanced that they can track down individual animals and humans. Cutting-edge technology tells the story of life on Earth from a brand new perspective.

programme.title: The Deep S1
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.desc: There's a new collection of Golde and Navy toys, and the Imp is determined to collect every last one of them. Unfortunately, his quest to obtain the rarest toy lands him in unexpected trouble.

programme.desc: Contestants get a taste of the high life with some of the finest ingredients. But first, a produce quiz lets one home cook choose how to split the top 6 into pairs. Each team gets assigned two premium proteins to be starred in a luxurious two course meal. The higher the team places in Round 1, the more time they get when competing as individuals in the fiery elimination challenge where they must cook a sweet and savoury dish showcasing the ingredient hidden in a mini-Mystery Box.

programme.title: Viddsee - The Miracle Barbershop
programme.desc: The Miracle Barbershop is a 5 part fantasy web series - where we delve into the remorse of 5 persons - a husband who desires to see his wife's smile for a last time, a young girl wishes to confess her love, a mother hopes to make her son one final meal, a daughter longs to fulfil the dying wish of her mother and a father to fulfill his last promise to his daughter. These persons fulfil their last wishes and find peace before departing for their next journey afterlife.

programme.title: Lion Mums: One For The Fans

programme.title: Revolution Launderette
programme.desc: In Tokyo, a young man Tomo, dogged by misfortune, sets out to beat his existence to its next punchline, together with Hiroko who obsesses over a stranger's old scrapbook. They agree to head into all the encounters that come their way, on a plan to decipher the parts of the whole and outwit this joke before it plays out. Their trip through signs, sounds and situations dives them into another side of the city - a maze of subcultures and surreal lingerings in the air.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2

programme.title: Regal Academy - Second Series
programme.desc: A mysterious thief is stealing Regal Academy students' precious belongings. Sheriff Little Red Riding Hood and her police-dogs are there to investigate. The heroes will summon a rainbow and leave for the mission, unaware of the trap set by the Snow Queen.

programme.title: Winx Club - Eighth Series
programme.desc: Helped by Alfea's teachers and the Specialists, the Winx manage to design a plan to sneak into Valtor's palace. Bloom manages to convince Icy to give the Winx the Prime Star of brotherly love. In this way, the Winx succeed in reforming the Wishing Star. The Star fulfills the Winx's desire to do the right thing and gives them new powers. The Winx defeat Valtor and make his palace disappear.
